prompt:
I have a tab separated file called "subjects.txt". Read it and tell me how many rows and columns it has. 

response:
```
# Read the file
data <- read.table("subjects.txt", sep = "\t")

# Check the number of rows and columns
rows <- nrow(data)
columns <- ncol(data)

# Print the results
rows
columns
```
Output:
The code will output the number of rows and number of columns in the "subjects.txt" file.
